name: Solar System Sim.
description:
This is the Solar Sytem Sim (BETA*)

The following elements added are

  1. The Sun
  2. The Mercury
  3. The Venus
  4. The Earth
  5. The Moon
  6. The Mars (Mars moons included)

(UPDATES EVERY 2 WEEKS AT 4:30 PM IST)
